meaning: Useful information / Key takeaways / Dry goods
description: Literally 「dry goods」 (dried food). Figuratively means content with no 「water」 (fluff), i.e., substantial, useful information or knowledge. 「Ganhuo manman」 means full of useful info.

examples.chinese: 干货满满超实用,速戳下图
examples.translation: Full of useful info and super practical, click the image below quickly.

examples.chinese: 干货满满,值得反复咀嚼
examples.translation: Full of useful info, worth chewing over repeatedly.

examples.chinese: 课程内容干货满满,涨姿势了
examples.translation: The course content is full of useful info, gained a lot of knowledge.
